title: 1 day ban for someone who afks in a ranked game

replies.body:
If you've said 

> 1 day ban for someone who afks in a ranked game if they've exceeded [_insert a reasonable base line frequency_]

then I may have nodded in agreement.

But this is unsatisfactory.

Im with Sekai on this, you can't just be banned outright after one instance of afking in ranked, there needs to be a set amount of games afked prior. as with what the others are saying on this post, there are a million and one reason for afking, sometimes the client screws you over (rito plz),

Yeah I can not agree all jokes aside. Have you ever been disconnected from a game? Unable to join again or were kicked because you disconnected for to long? Well if you have that means you would encure a 1 day ban to bad for you ay. 

And afk/DC same thing, because if the ban is only for afk (not a great idea if you ask me anyways) people will just unplug the Internet.

Honestly though 1 day ban for afking for 1 game? A little much don't you think?
